mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATEID as "${columnPrefix}templateId", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATENO as "${columnPrefix}templateNo", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATENAME as "${columnPrefix}templateName", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATETYPECODE as "${columnPrefix}templateTypeCode", ${tableAlias}S_TRAINSETTYPE as "${columnPrefix}trainsetType", ${tableAlias}S_BATCH as "${columnPrefix}batch", ${tableAlias}S_REMARK as "${columnPrefix}remark", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATEPATH as "${columnPrefix}templatePath", ${tableAlias}S_ITEMCODE as "${columnPrefix}itemCode", ${tableAlias}S_ITEMNAME as "${columnPrefix}itemName", ${tableAlias}I_MARSHALCOUNT as "${columnPrefix}marshalCount", ${tableAlias}I_MARSHALLINGTYPE as "${columnPrefix}marshallingType", ${tableAlias}C_ALLOWEDITROW as "${columnPrefix}allowEditRow", ${tableAlias}C_ALLOWEDITCOLUMN as "${columnPrefix}allowEditColumn"
